synopsis.p: Plot raw I&Q samples from a iqdat format file.

description.p: Plot raw I&Q iqmap format files.
The output is to the X terminal. The program acts as a "virtual" oscilloscope allowing the user to replay I&Q samples taken at the radar.

example.description: Plot the I&Q samples from the iqdat file called "20080318.iqdat" on the X terminal.
